serverInfo.name: Meta-Audio
serverInfo.title: Meta Audio
serverInfo.description: Provides unified access to multiple AI audio engines, including Meta, Google, OpenAI, Stability, Together, Azure, and AsyncAI. Supports text-to-speech, speech-to-text, and audio analysis through one consistent MCP interface. Ideal for experimenting, comparing, or composing audio tasks directly across different AI-native providers.
